name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;After planning with Dean, Sages heads north to Port Brin.
narrate;Narrator;However, the port is currently facing problems of its own...
speak;Sages;Yes? How may I help you, fair one?
speak;Cacti;My name is Cacti. My father is arriving soon from his travels...|But, the port town is overrun with pirates!
speak;Sages;Oh dear, that will not do!|He is arriving by boat?
speak;Cacti;Why else would I be concerned?!
speak;Sages;Now, miss, there's no need for that...
speak;Cacti;My apologies, I just wouldn't want anything to happen to him...
speak;Sages;Perchance, could we utilise his boat...?
speak;Cacti;Only if you'll take me with you.
speak;Cacti;You may not have introduced yourself...|But who you are is obvious, Prince Sages.
speak;Sages;Wow, can a man not have his privacy?|Tsk, tsk.
speak;Cacti;An adventure with a prince sounds exciting, what can I say?
speak;Pete;C'mon, you've gotta pull your weight!|Or we'll make ya walk the plank...
speak;Angel;Man, Apple left me out here to dry...|Even the old gang was better than this...|Even if the boss was a flop...
speak;Cacti;Things are a mess!|Father won't be able to dock if there's all this chaos...
speak;Sages;Say no more, this will be a piece of cake!
